scripts.build:css: sass src/sass/output.scss public/css/styles.css && npx tailwindcss -i public/css/styles.css -o public/css/styles.css
scripts.watch:css: concurrently "sass src/sass/output.scss public/css/styles.css --watch" "npx tailwindcss -i public/css/styles.css -o public/css/styles.css --watch"
